title: Bot Lifecycle Test
body:
Need to test the following scenarios:
- [x] Issue marked as stale after X days of no activity since needs-more-info was applied (testing with `bot-test`)
- [x] If someone responds to an open stale issue, remove stale, remove needs-more-info (bot-test), apply `needs-attention`
- [x] Stale issue is closed after X days of no activity since `stale` was applied
- [x] If someone responds to a closed stale issue, keep closed & apply `needs-attention`

Bot skips issue when:
- [x] Has backlog milestone 
- [x] Has discussion milestone 
- [x] Has `bot-exclude`
- [x] Has `needs-triage` when attempting to mark an issue stale

nodes.body: This issue is marked as stale because feedback has been requested for 30 days with no response. Please respond within 14 days or this issue will be closed due to inactivity.
